page.title: 02RELIGION:FLEET CHURCH
page.content: BEFORE THE{SECOND WORLD WAR THE CHURCH HAD A{THATCHED ROOF}BUT IT HAS BEEN REPLACED WITH NEW TILES. THE GRASS AROUND{THE CHURCH}IS OFTEN CUT EXCEPT AROUND{THE GRAVE STONES.}THERE IS AN OLD WALL SURROUNDING THE{CHURCH}BUT IT IS IN BAD CONDITION. THERE ARE STAINED GLASS WINDOWS THAT HAVE GOT BARS TO PROTECT THEM. THE OLD GATE AND PATH ARE STILL THERE AND ARE IN GOOD CONDITION. SADLY THE DOOR OF THE {CHURCH}HAS BEEN VANDALISED WITH WRITING AND CARVINGS. INSIDE THE {CHURCH THE ALTAR IS STILL THERE WITH THE CROSS AND CANDLESTICKS AND SOME OF THE PRAYER SEATS HAVE BEEN REPLACED WITH BENCHES. A LADY COMES TO CHECK AND MAKE THE CHURCH TIDY AND TO LOCK IT UP EVERY NIGHT. A PASSAGE HAS BEEN FOUND IN THE CHURCH WHERE{SMUGGLERS LONG AGO HID {THEIR CONTRABAND.
